thread.section_title: Juniqe Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Juniqe | juniqe.com
thread.title: Tim Kussmaul

author: Tim Kussmaul
title: Tim Kussmaul
text: I ordered a hoodie wich had some quality issues (a hole to be mor specific). I contacted Customer Service via Email and sent them some phots on a friday afternoon. Half an Hour later, a very nice Lady from Customer Service contacted me and ask me if i wanted a new hoodie or a voucher for a new Order. I chose the New hoodie and three days later the hoodie arrived. Uncomplicated Customer Service as it should be !!!!
